ComBrand: 蒂森克虏伯(中国)投资有限公司
JobDescribe:
1. learn and command the knowledge of all error stack codes 学习并掌握所有故障堆栈代码；
2. make daily analysis on error stacks of needed projects (estimately with 100 units) and submit the report as well as weekly analysis summary to management team 每日对所需的项目（预计100台梯）进行堆栈代码分析并提交管理层并每周提交汇总分析报告；
3. supervise onsite management of the needed projects (e.g. data accuracy) 监控所需项目的现场管理工作（数据准确性等）；
4. provide remote technical support on statistics 提供远程数据技术支持；
5. establish a set of mechanism of remote monitoring and statistics analysis 建立一套完善的远程监控和数据分析机制；
6. deal with temporary tasks and assist the superiors including German experts, colleagues from the branch, etc. to handle urgent issues 处理临时问题并协助上级（包括德国专家、分公司同事等）处理紧急事务。
　
Background (State the required education,working experience, language and skills)

Education (Degree, major) :College degree or above
Working Experience (minimum working year & experience):At least 2 years of working experience
Knowledge of elevators and escalators parts or machinery industry is a must                                                                                                   
Language:basic English
Office skills:Good command of Ms Office
Other specific skills:Good communication skill and team work
